quote: Foreknowledge cannot be gotten from ghosts and spirits, cannot be had by analogy, cannot be found out by calculation. It must be obtained from people, people who know the conditions of the enemy.
quote_letters: FOREKNOWLEDGE CANNOT BE GOTTEN FROM GHOSTS AND SPIRITS CANNOT BE HAD BY ANALOGY CANNOT BE FOUND OUT BY CALCULATION IT MUST BE OBTAINED FROM PEOPLE PEOPLE WHO KNOW THE CONDITIONS OF THE ENEMY
source: Sun Tzu, The Art of War
